customer_name: EAST COAST EXOTIC ANIMAL RESCUE INC
site_name: EAST COAST EXOTIC ANIMAL RESCUE INC

citations.desc: Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control.
citations.narrative:
The grounds surrounding the singly housed African green monkey, the three brown capuchins, and the agile gibbon
enclosure had areas of tall weeds. The weeds were approximately two feet in height and surrounded a majority of the
enclosures. Uncontrolled weeds can make it difficult to facilitate cleaning of the premises and allow for harborage of
pests. The weeds must be cut in order to maintain proper husbandry practices and pest control.
Correct by : June 1, 2021.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
Additional Inspectors:
MELISSA CARLSON, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section

narrative:
3.84(c) 
   
Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control. 
The grounds surrounding the singly housed African green monkey, the three brown capuchins, and the agile gibbon 
enclosure had areas of tall weeds.  The weeds were approximately two feet in height and surrounded a majority of the 
enclosures.  Uncontrolled weeds can make it difficult to facilitate cleaning of the premises and allow for harborage of 
pests.  The weeds must be cut in order to maintain proper husbandry practices and pest control. 
Correct by : June 1, 2021. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
MELISSA CARLSON, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section
